Yongnam Contracts Win for 202020 July 2020 Yongnam secure first design and build $320.4m contract for JURONG REGION LINE JV with Daewoo E&C listed on Korea Stock Exchange. The 24km long region line will be Singapore 7th MRT line. What most attract me to Yongnam is the future of Yongnam securing major MRT works given that it is the first MRT project secured as part of a JV as a main contractor.16 July 2020 Yongnam Secures 4 contract worth total $63m in Singapore and Hong Kong; 2 Structural steelworks on SGH campus and Regional Sport centre in Punggol.Key takeways Both Annoucements is Expected to have a positive Impact on financials perforamance for FY 2020.I believe Yongnam is poised to ride Covid-19 recovery given the tourism sector recovery  oil & gas and getting its foothold back on track again. 2021 look like a exciting year for YONGNAM.

DO NOT rely on the Poems Scrap Book record to determine what you actually have in your CDP acct. E.g. If you buy 10000 MT shares through Poems  hold for 2 weeks  then u sell all the 10000 MT shares through DBSV. Your Poems record will still show that u have 10000 MT shares. If u sell these 10000 shares through Poems again  u r short selling.
